post_title: Luxair Flight 9642 will be featured in Season 25

comments.author: NetInfused
comments.body: Came here late to say the same thing :) Mentour Pilot is one of my favorites. He dives technically into what caused the accident and he's also very respectful.

comments.author: Cautious_Use_7442
comments.body: Some airline even had a few episode on their entertainment system. A bit weird to offer that to passengers while they hurdle through the air at +900 kph

comments.body: This is my go-to series to watch while waiting for my boarding to start.
